# The `BoundsCheckingPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A pass to instrument code and perform run-time bounds checking on loads, stores, and other memory intrinsics. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::BoundsCheckingPass</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A pass to instrument code and perform run-time bounds checking on loads, stores, and other memory intrinsics.

Definition at line 20 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/instrumentation/boundschecking-h">BoundsChecking.h</a>.
